listitem.para: All security updates issued for UCS 4.1-2 are included:

listitem.simpara: graphicsmagick (CVE-2016-5118) (41441).
imagemagick (CVE-2016-5118) (41439).
Setting an UCR variable with the conditional "?" operator didn't set the variable if it already existed in another scope. This is changed to only check the scope the variable is set in (40728).
Starting the LDAP daemon on i686 systems with a MDB backend and a MDB maxsize of at least 2147483648 could potentially fail. The init script now triple checks the start (33993).
Access to the UVMM object classes is now more restrictive (41723).
Regular users are prevented from changing their object class (41179).
Users can now only create objects with univentionAdminUserSettings object class underneath of cn=admin-settings (41180).
Various restrictions for Memberserver and Domaincontrollers have been added to the LDAP ACL (41715).
IPv6 support was added to get_notifier_id.py (39509).
The help messages for univention-directory-listener-ctrl have been improved. Also two new subcommand modules and status have been added (3490).
Some string and integer comparison bugs have been fixed (38696).
The Listener did not drop root privileges in all error cases. This issue has been fixed (34324).
Some old and no longer needed code has been removed to reduce the memory footprint (30227).
Some debug messages have been cleaned up (34738).
Some data structures are no longer allocated dynamically but put onto the stack to make the Listener more robust against memory allocation problems (34507).

A bug in handling the notifier ID has been fixed: If the Listener was restarted multiple times, the last processed transaction ID could be lost. This led to all transactions being skipped which happened in between (41261).
The locking has been improved to prevent multiple instances of the Listener running at the same time (22383).
The transaction log is now only written on systems where the Notifier is installed as well to prevent the hard disk from filling up (40600).
The code for flat-mode replication has been removed (30489).
The check for a full file system was inverted and has been fixed (28232).
LDAP objects having a multi-valued RDN attributes are now handled correctly during a rename and move (33594).
A traceback in failed LDIF mode has been fixed (41347).
The replication module now logs more information in case of an object class violation (31757).

The replication module no longer runs as the user root. The directory /var/lib/univention-directory-replication/ is now owned by the user listener. The failed.ldif files are now owned by the user listener and the LDAP connections are now made by the user listener (34324).
UMC is now also usable in Chrome 51 (41224).
Show a warning message if browser cookies are disabled and ask the user to enable them (28665).
Make it possible to collect usage data from the system setup to make future improvements to the user experience even better (40551).
The Sanitizer base class now accepts a parameter allow_none to allow None values (41424).
A new DNSanitizer has been added, to validate LDAP distinguished names (41423).
A UMC server crash is now prevented in specific circumstances after login (41070).
A UMC server crash is now prevented for requests with malicious request data (41370).
The UMC client does not evaluate python code in its arguments anymore (41736).
When upgrading a regular App to a Docker App, the Apache proxy settings were not written correctly. This has been fixed (41178).
The German and English description about the sale of licenses and support in the Univention App Center has been aligned (40757).
Docker Apps did not register their web interface correctly in the UCS overview site. This has been fixed (40842).
When Docker Apps were updated, a new version of the shipped join script was not recognized. This has been fixed, the join script is now correctly installed and executed (41452).
The button on the App page which read Open module or Open Website has been relabeled to just Open (41227).
One could not uninstall Apps that other Apps required to be installed somewhere in the domain, even if this App was installed several times. This has been fixed (41217).
Minor code changes make other projects easier that rely on the App Center (41360, 41770).
Uninstalling an App failed when the App was not properly registered before (41542).
Tests run before upgrading an App used the installed version, not the to-be-installed version (41532).
A function to detect a docker bridge network conflict has been added (41596).
The use of UDM handler objects has been optimized (41658).
Access to the object class univentionApp is now more restrictive (41724).
The App Center now displays a warning if a conflict between the systems network settings and the docker bridge network has been detected (40515).
When searching for Apps, the Vendor (and Maintainer) of the App is considered (41702).
Apps may now require a specific version to be already installed, before an upgrade is possible (33537).
When opening an App in the Gallery that is not yet installed, a notification is sent to Univention (41690).
When (un)installing an App, a notification is always sent to Univention. If the App does not say otherwise, this notification is anonymized (41691).
When a non Docker version of an App was installed, the upgrade to a Docker version is prohibited unless the App says it is safe to upgrade (41804).
The App Center sometimes installed the last-to-latest App version (41841).
Executing missing join scripts in a Docker Container is now supported (39551).

section.title: &ucsUDM; UMC modules and command line interface

listitem.simpara: Extended options are now also evaluated for user objects (41017).
The UDM command line tool now supports the use of --remove on single value attributes. Before --set attribute= had to be used (41172).
Some old code which handled custom attributes has been removed (41266).
The object class of extended options is now always added or removed to the object without the need to change an attribute (25240).
The extended attribute option to remove the object class if it is no longer needed has been re-enabled (41207).
The attribute sambaPwdLastSet is now set for computer objects while changing the password (41367).
Syntax classes based on UDM_Attribute with single value attributes has been fixed to correctly detect the possible field values (41290).
Extended options are now always evaluated when instantiating a UDM object (41580).
Special characters (such as +) are now correctly escaped when composing a DN for a newly created object (40041).
Some LDAP filters are now properly escaped (40129).
A man in the middle attack and a local root code execution vulnerability in the UDM CLI client has been fixed (40422).

section.title: Modules for system settings / setup wizard

listitem.simpara: This update publishes some minor adjustments in the source code (40913).
The package phantomjs has been added. It is necessary for the new App appliances (40934).
Apps may now provide design information for branding UCS appliances (40826).
Apps may now provide more detailed information on the first steps to take after their initial installation/setup (38957).
App appliances may be configured to offer a fast setup mode with a pre-configured UCS domain (41622).

A new option for setting up a UCS system has been added which allows a fast instantiation for demo purposes. Some more aspects of the setup process have been improved w.r.t. reliability and speed (40046).
Some more corrections have been applied for the fast UCS instantiation (41283, 41932).
A UCR variable for enabling/disabling the fast instantiation has been added (41622).
Problems with a hanging setup process when finishing have been corrected (40985).
The timeout for internal LDAP queries during changes of network configurations has been adjusted for the UCS setup process (40968).
The rendering of the welcome screen after booting a UCS system has been improved and OverlayFS log messages have been removed (41026).
Problems with a disabled repository after setup have been corrected (40710).
An error dialog has been corrected which eventually showed up during the setup process stating that no module would be available (40751).
A typo in the header for the initial setup of UCS on an Amazon EC2 instance has been corrected (40673).
Enable collection of usage data during the system setup to allow future improvements to the user experience (40551).
Regenerate the system UUID during the fast setup demo mode to ensure a unique system (41140).
Errors that occur during the system setup of UCS can now be sent as feedback to Univention by the user (40782).
Redirection problems for app appliances at the end of the setup wizard have been corrected (41793).
The AD connector is now automatically installed if UCS is joining an AD domain (37333).
The command univention-add-app has been adapted to reflect changes in the App Center package (33537).
Clarified a confusing message when UCS release updates are blocked because of missing Apps or components (40458).
The Updater was adapted for UCS 4.1-3 (41895).
The method get_schema() has been added to the class univention.uldap.access which returns LDAP schema information (41207).

A faulty policy type detection has been fixed that could lead to wrong results of univention_policy_result. This misbehavior affected the DHCP service and other services using univention_policy_result (41641).
The python ldap utilities are now used for splitting a DN's in univention.ulap (40129).
Handling of DN's has been improved (40041).

No modrdn operations are performed anymore if the DN didn't changed when modifying a object with uppercase letters in the attribute name of its RDN. This was a regression caused by UCS 4.1-2 errata 207 (41785).
The SAML package is now handled in the translation process (41222).
univention-certificate check now also checks the expiry date of the certificate (31369).
univention-certificate new now also accepts the -days parameter (39257).
univention-certificate now checks the UCS server role, as its full functionality is only available on the 'DC Master' (24094).
Changing the &ucsUCRV; ssl/default/hashfunction and ssl/default/bits now takes immediate effect (40498).
During the initial CA creation 2.debian.pool.ntp.org is used in addition, which also contains IPv6 capable time servers (25285).
The certificate revocation list in now updated periodically. The intervals are configured through the &ucsUCRV; ssl/crl/interval and ssl/crl/validity (35748).
The SSL extension example has been fixed to work with with non-bash-shells (39045).
Locking has been added to prevent parallel execution when managing certificates (35027).
Server certificates are no longer revoked and re-created when the LDAP host entry is only moved (41230).
The new &ucsUCRV; ssl/ca/cipher can be used to chose the encryption mechanism for the private key of the root CA. The new default is aes256 (37621).
The new &ucsUCRV; ssl/host/objectclass can be used to configure the LDAP object classes for which SSL certificates are automatically created (38903).
Some shell variable quoting problems have been fixed in the shell library for SSL handling (41917).
The timeout for the SPN account samba search in the join script has been increased (and is now configurable via the &ucsUCRV; squid/kerberos/join/timeout) (41443).

The Name-Service-Switch (NSS) module extrausers is used to get user group information from LDAP. The implementation of getgrouplist() was not thread-safe, which caused (for example libvirtd) to crash on restart. Proper locking has been added (39775).
Allow creating snapshots of VMs with more than 4 GiB RAM which is supported with QEMU since version 1.1 (35581).
A default password for all VNC sessions can be configured through the new &ucsUCRV; uvmm/kvm/vnc/password (41340).
The docker daemon options are now configurable via the &ucsUCRV; docker/daemon/default/opts/$PARAM=$VALUE (40515).
The start of the docker daemon is aborted if a docker bridge network conflict has been detected (40515).
Use the docker bip setting for docker specific iptables rules (40515).
Workaround cron hard-link issue on OverlayFS (39677).
Executing missing join scripts in a Docker Container is now supported (39551).
This update fixes regressions from Errata update 411 (Bug #40988) (41193).
The default RPC timeout has been increased from 60 to 480 seconds. Thus, a join with more than 100.000 objects will work (41021).

Reliability of samba_dnsupdate has been improved on UCS@school DC Slaves by using localhost for DNS related Kerberos operations. This fixes an intermittent error in the 98univention-samba4slavepdc-dns.inst joinscript (34908).
The restart command of the samba init wrapper script has been adjusted to avoid restarting samba-ad-dc after NMBD (41551).
The GetGroupsForUser SAMR RPC call has been adjusted to make use of the memberOf attribute (41644).
Two additional regression patches from the badlock update have been merged (41729).
The mapping for msPrintConnectionPolicy has been fixed (41309)..
A restart of the Samba LDAP server during the initialization phase of the connector could lead to an endless loop in the the initialization. This issue has been fixed (41288).
Add support for overriding IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of specific DNS host records. Feature added for upcoming UCS@school release (41482).
Allow recreation of object deleted in Samba/AD if visible in OpenLDAP (41756).
Allow recreation of account deleted in Samba/AD if objectSid matches (41864).

When an object gets moved out of visibility for an UCS@school Samba/AD PDC Slave attributes passed to the S4-Connector were mixed up. This caused the next object modified to be marked internally as deleted by the S4-Connector, while it is perfectly healthy in fact. While this update fixes the issue, manual steps are be required to unmark the objects and restore normal sync (41884).
A traceback due to empty proxyAddresses in AD during the synchronization has been fixed (41246).
Close the SAMR user connection during password sync to Active Directory (41247).
ucslint no longer warns about files processed by some debhelper scripts supporting the --name argument (41603).
ucslint now also accepts "${@}" for padding join credentials (34253).
ucslint warns when univention-ldapsearch -x is used (38853).
The boot splash has been extended to allow adjustments of its design (41821, 39465).
The package univention-mysql has been added. It allows to configure arbitrary MySQL settings through UCR variables named mysql/config/$group/$option (39471, 40216).
When installing a translation generated by this package, UCR variables concerning the locale are now set correctly (40917).
JavaScript files are now handled correctly on package generation (40936).
The translation process is simplified by requiring less steps (41223).
